original_title: 5 murders in house in Delft Island
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News1st) – 05 people have been murdered with sharp weapons in a house in Delft Island, Jaffna.
Police suspect the murders took place between the 21st night and the 22nd morning.
A senior police officer said the injured woman is being brought to the Jaffna hospital by boat.
Police say the deceased are elderly people and have been identified as relatives.
